tidbits.title: Garden City
tidbits.description: Singapore is known as a 'Garden City' due to its abundance of green spaces and innovative urban planning, including iconic gardens like Gardens by the Bay.

tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: The city-state boasts a diverse population, resulting in a rich tapestry of cultures, religions, and cuisines, fostering a harmonious and multicultural society.

tidbits.title: Technological Hub
tidbits.description: Singapore is a leading technological and financial hub in Southeast Asia, renowned for its innovation, efficient infrastructure, and global connectivity.
